channel.title: Question about coding, I'm new to this
channel.description: The source I just got says he changed the ::item command to all players and I'm wondering how to change it to admin + again and what file its in?

item.title: Question about coding, I'm new to this
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

Hes probably using Delta.

Because hes a beginner.

Go to ( ( client.java ) ) and search for

startsWith("yell")

And replace that line with this

if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 2) {

2 = Admin

playerRights >= 2)

1 = Mod

playerRights >= 1)

3 = Owner

playerRights >= 3)

Read full topic
